name: spo-get-all-hub-site-main-sites-and-navigation-nodes
title: Get All Hub Site Main Sites and Navigation Nodes
shortDescription: Get all hub site main sites and navigation nodes using PnP PowerShell and update nodes if required.
longDescription: In This script sample, first we will connect to the SharePoint admin site, get all hub site main sites and navigation nodes using PnP PowerShell and update nodes if required.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
